name: primoager
0:
”Alexa ask primo ager what is the humidity in smart cabinet”
”Alexa, ask primo ager to turn on smart cabinet.”
”Alexa ask primo ager to set smart cabinet temperature to 55 degree”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: primo ager
des:
Primo Ager is the world’s most advanced professional-grade dry aging system. It is fully automated and ensures your meat is always of the highest quality and safety standards. This skill enables users to control primo ager devices using alexa. Users can control various aspects of the device like temperature, humidity, light, etc by giving voice commands to alexa.

You can enable your skill with the following method:
1) Search "primo ager" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category:
2) Click Enable skill of "primo ager", and you'll be navigated to primo ager smart home login page;
3) Input your primo ager account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page;

Now Setup has been completed.

Alexa Utterance

Humidity
Alexa ask primo ager to set humidity on smart cabinet to 37
Alexa ask primo ager what’s the humidity in smart cabinet.

Temperature
Alexa ask primo ager to set smart cabinet temperature to 55 degree
Alexa, ask primo ager to set temperature to 55 degree on smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager what's the temperature in smart cabinet.


ON/OFF
Alexa, ask primo ager to turn on smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager to turn off smart cabinet


Light

Alexa ask primo ager to turn {on/off} light in smart cabinet
Alexa ask primo ager to turn {on/off} the light in smart cabinet
Alexa ask primo ager to turn {on/off} {UV/ L.E.D} light in smart cabinet
Alexa ask primo ager to turn {on/off} the {UV/ L.E.D} light in smart cabinet


Light Level

Alexa ask primo ager to set UV light level to three(1-5) in smart cabinet
Alexa ask primo ager to set light level to five(1-5) in smart cabinet
Alexa ask primo ager to set UV light level at three(1-5) in smart cabinet
Alexa ask primo ager to set light level at five(1-5) in smart cabinet
Alexa ask primo ager to get light level in smart cabinet
Alexa ask primo ager to get UV light level in smart cabinet

Slot set / age
Alexa, ask primo ager to age slot 1 to 35 days in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager to age slot 1 for 35 days in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager to age chicken in slot 3 to 45 days in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager to age chicken in slot 3 for 45 days in smart cabinet


Change slot
Alexa, ask primo ager to change slot 1 to 25 days in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager to change slot 1 for 25 days in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager to change slot 1 at 25 days in smart cabinet


Status
Alexa, ask primo ager how many days remained for slot 3 (1-5) in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager how many days remaining for slot 3 (1-5) in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager which slot is ready in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager when is the earliest ready slot in smart cabinet


Condition
Alexa, ask primo ager How is my slot 1(1-5) in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager How is my slot 3 in smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager what is the condition of Slot 1 in smart cabinet



Food
Alexa, ask primo ager what is in slot 1 of smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager what is in the slot 1 of smart cabinet
Alexa, ask primo ager what’s in the slot 1 of smart cabinet
